00109 cache_content_gc_policy_t cache_content_gc_policy ;

00121 void cache_content_set_gc_policy( cache_content_gc_policy_t policy )
00122 {
00123   cache_content_gc_policy = policy ;
00124 } /* cache_content_set_gc_policy */
00125

00134 cache_content_gc_policy_t cache_content_get_gc_policy( void )
00135 {
00136   return cache_content_gc_policy ;
00137 } /* cache_content_get_gc_policy */
00138 
00152 static int cache_content_gc_resync( cache_content_entry_t   * pentry, 
00153                                     cache_content_client_t  * pclient ) 
00154 {
00155   cache_content_status_t cache_content_status ;
00156   fsal_op_context_t      fsal_op_context ;
00157 
00158   if( cache_content_status = cache_content_flush( pentry, 
00159                                                   CACHE_CONTENT_FLUSH_AND_DELETE, 
00160                                                   pclient, 
00161                                                   &fsal_op_context, 
00162                                                   &cache_content_status ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00163     return FALSE ;
00164   
00165   return TRUE ;
00166 } /* cache_content_gc_resync */
00167 
00183 static int cache_content_gc_suppress( cache_content_entry_t * pentry, cache_content_client_t * pclient ) 
00184 {
00185   cache_content_status_t cache_content_status ;
00186 
00187   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG,
00188                      "Entry %p  will be garbagged", pentry ) ;
00189 
00190   /* Set the entry as invalid */
00191   pentry->internal_md.valid_state = TO_BE_GARBAGGED  ;
00192 
00193 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_CONTENT_GC
00194   printf( "****> cache_content_suppress on %p\n", pentry ) ;
00195 #endif
00196 
00197   /* Remove refences in the parent entries */
00198   if( cache_content_release_entry( pentry, pclient, &cache_content_status ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00199     return  LRU_LIST_DO_NOT_SET_INVALID ;
00200 
00201   return  LRU_LIST_SET_INVALID ;
00202 } /* cache_content_gc_suppress */
00203 
00219 int cache_content_gc_function( LRU_entry_t * plru_entry, void * addparam )
00220 {
00221   cache_content_client_t * pclient ;
00222   cache_content_entry_t  * pentry = NULL ;
00223   time_t                   last_entry_op_time ;
00224 
00225   /* Get the client attributes from the arguments */
00226   pclient = (cache_content_client_t *)addparam ;
00227 
00228   /* Get the related pentry */
00229   pentry = (cache_content_entry_t *)(plru_entry->buffdata.pdata) ;
00230 
00231   /* Do not garbagge an entry that is not synced with the FSAL */
00232   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.sync_state != SYNC_OK ) 
00233     return 0 ;
00234  
00235   last_entry_op_time = ( pentry->internal_md.read_time >  pentry->internal_md.mod_time) ? pentry->internal_md.read_time : pentry->internal_md.mod_time ;
00236 
00237   if( time( NULL ) - last_entry_op_time  > cache_content_gc_policy.lifetime )
00238     {
00239         DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00240                            "----->>>>>>>> DATA GC : Garbagge collection on data entry %p", pentry ) ;
00241         return cache_content_gc_suppress( pentry, pclient ) ;
00242     }
00243   /* Default return, entry is not to be set invalid */
00244   return 0 ;
00245 } /* cache_content_gc_function */
00246 
00247 
00263 int cache_content_sync_function( LRU_entry_t * plru_entry, void * addparam )
00264 {
00265   cache_content_client_t * pclient ;
00266   cache_content_entry_t  * pentry = NULL ;
00267   time_t                   last_entry_op_time ;
00268 
00269   /* Get the client attributes from the arguments */
00270   pclient = (cache_content_client_t *)addparam ;
00271 
00272   /* Get the related pentry */
00273   pentry = (cache_content_entry_t *)(plru_entry->buffdata.pdata) ;
00274 
00275   /* Do not resync an entry that do not need flsuh, test the others instead */
00276   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.sync_state != FLUSH_NEEDED ) 
00277     return TRUE ;
00278  
00279   last_entry_op_time = ( pentry->internal_md.read_time >  pentry->internal_md.mod_time) ? pentry->internal_md.read_time : pentry->internal_md.mod_time ;
00280 
00281   if( time( NULL ) - last_entry_op_time  > cache_content_gc_policy.inactivity_before_flush )
00282     {
00283         DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_DEBUG, 
00284                            "----->>>>>>>> DATA GC : Resynchronisation on data entry %p", pentry ) ;
00285         return cache_content_gc_resync( pentry, pclient ) ;
00286     }
00287   /* Default return, return TRUE */
00288   return TRUE ;
00289 } /* cache_content_sync_function */
00290 
00308 cache_content_status_t cache_content_gc(  cache_content_client_t     * pclient,
00309                                           cache_content_status_t     * pstatus)
00310 {
00311    cache_content_status_t cache_content_status ;
00312    int rc = 0 ;
00313 
00314    if( pstatus == NULL || pclient == NULL )
00315         return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00316    else
00317         *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00318    
00319    /* Do we need to perform a garbagge collection ? */
00320    /* It is necessay to perform garbagge collection */
00321   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "File Content cache garbagge collection is needed" ) ;
00322 
00323   /* Do the gc and set the garbagge entries as invalid */
00324   if( LRU_invalidate_by_function( pclient->lru_gc, cache_content_gc_function, (void *)pclient )  != LRU_LIST_SUCCESS )
00325   {
00326     *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LRU_ERROR ;
00327     return *pstatus ;
00328   }
00329 
00330   /* Removes the entries that were set invalid at the former step */
00331   if( LRU_gc_invalid( pclient->lru_gc, NULL )  )
00332   {
00333     *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LRU_ERROR ;
00334     return *pstatus ;
00335   }
00336 
00337    
00338    return CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00339 } /* cache_content_gc */
00340 
00341 
00359 cache_content_status_t cache_content_sync(  cache_content_client_t     * pclient,
00360                                             cache_content_status_t     * pstatus)
00361 {
00362    cache_content_status_t cache_content_status ;
00363    int rc = 0 ;
00364 
00365    if( pstatus == NULL || pclient == NULL )
00366         return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00367    else
00368         *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00369    
00370    /* It is necessay to perform garbagge collection */
00371    DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "File Content cache garbagge collection is needed" ) ;
00372 
00373    /* Do the gc and set the garbagge entries as invalid */
00374   if( LRU_apply_function( pclient->lru_gc, cache_content_sync_function, (void *)pclient )  != LRU_LIST_SUCCESS )
00375    {
00376       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LRU_ERROR ;
00377       return *pstatus ;
00378    }
00379    
00380    return CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00381 } /* cache_content_sync */
00382 
00383 
00384 
00385 int cache_content_invalidate_flushed( LRU_entry_t * plru_entry, void * addparam )
00386 {
00387   cache_content_entry_t   * pentry = NULL ;
00388   cache_content_client_t  * pclient = NULL ;
00389 
00390 
00391   pentry = (cache_content_entry_t *)plru_entry->buffdata.pdata ;
00392   pclient = (cache_content_client_t *)addparam ;
00393 
00394   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.sync_state != SYNC_OK )
00395     {
00396       /* Entry is not to be set invalid */
00397       return LRU_LIST_DO_NOT_SET_INVALID ;
00398     }
00399 
00400   /* Clean up and set the entry invalid */
00401   P( pentry->pentry_inode->lock ) ;
00402   pentry->pentry_inode->object.file.pentry_content = NULL ;
00403   V( pentry->pentry_inode->lock ) ;
00404 
00405   /* Release the entry */
00406   RELEASE_PREALLOC( pentry, pclient->pool_entry, next_alloc ) ;
00407 
00408 
00409   /* Retour de la pentry dans le pool */
00410   return LRU_LIST_SET_INVALID ;
00411 } /* cache_content_invalidate_flushed */
